Name: Draoi Cath
Equipment_Options: Models in this Formation are equipped with Celtic Shortsword and a Fae Greatstaff.
Faction_Abilities: Battle Mages This Formation may only attempt to cast the Magic Blast Magic Spell and the Magic Blast Magic Spell deals D3 Ethereal Damage instead of 1.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: When a model from this Formation is destroyed, it may make Melee Attacks as if it were the Melee Combat Step.
